text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
I wonder how much running I can do<n>once I get off the train
and get home.<n>Either way, I have to run twice as<n>much as
usual tomorrow...

text_block_list.name: Sweep Tosho
text_block_list.text: Hold it right there!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Sweep?!

text_block_list.name: Sweep Tosho
text_block_list.text: ...Scarlet, come with me!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: What? Why?! I told you I was going<n>home—

text_block_list.name: Sweep Tosho
text_block_list.text: Just shut up and come! Follow me!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: What? Geez, what does she want<n>now?

text_block_list.name: Sweep Tosho
text_block_list.text:
Stay there! I'm going to cast one of<n>my greatest spells on
you!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: A spell? Wait a sec—

text_block_list.name: Sweep Tosho
text_block_list.text: Brassavola ☆ nodosa! ☆<n>Paphiopedilum ☆ delenatii!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Uh... Nothing's happening.

text_block_list.name: Sweep Tosho
text_block_list.text:
Huh?! I-I just messed up a little,<n>that's all! As a favor, I'll
cast it on you<n>one more time!

text_block_list.name: Sweep Tosho
text_block_list.text: Brassavola ☆ nodosa! ☆<n>Paphiopedilum ☆ delenatii!

text_block_list.name: Sweep Tosho
text_block_list.text: Brassavola ☆ nodosa! ☆<n>Paphiopedilum ☆ delenatii!

text_block_list.name: Sweep Tosho
text_block_list.text: Waaaaah! Why, why, why isn'tit working?! Why aren't any red rosesappearing?! And why won't any white pigeons come out?!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: ...Red roses? White pigeons?

text_block_list.name: Sweep Tosho
text_block_list.text:
This spell is really amazing! No matter<n>how sad you are, it
turns your frown<n>upside down the moment you see it!

text_block_list.name: Sweep Tosho
text_block_list.text: Grandma showed it to me so manytimes... Hic! It really is superamazing! Waaaaah!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: ...Were you trying to comfort me?

text_block_list.name: Sweep Tosho
text_block_list.text:
No! I was trying to cast a spell on you<n>because you looked
sad!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
Magic, huh? Hehe...Thank you. I really<n>appreciate you doing
that for me.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: ...I'm sure your grandmother loves<n>you very much.

text_block_list.name: Sweep Tosho
text_block_list.text: Sniff... What do you mean?

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
She used sleight—er, real magic to<n>cheer you up, right? Her
love for you<n>allowed her to do that.

text_block_list.name: Sweep Tosho
text_block_list.text: Really?

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
Really. You can only cheer someone<n>up when you give them
enough<n>attention to notice that they're upset<n>to begin with.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
It's like with my mom. She used to<n>take me to the
amusement park or out<n>shopping when I was feeling down.<n>
I'm sure it's because she...

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: ...was always looking after me.

"I hope you like the swimsuit I got<n>you. You've been so
busy lately. Take<n>some time to visit the beach or pool<n>once
in a while, dear. Love, Mama."

text_block_list.name: Sweep Tosho
text_block_list.text: ...Scarlet?

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
Was that why... she sent me the<n>letter? Not because I did
poorly at the<n>scrimmage...

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
...but because she cared about me...<n>and saw that I needed
a break? Is<n>that... Is that really it?
Daiwa Scarlet freezes for a moment<n>and clutches her head.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Sigh...

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
Of course that was it. There's no way<n>that Mama would've
been that<n>mean... Normally, I would've realized<n>her intent
right away, and yet...

text_block_list.name: Sweep Tosho
text_block_list.text: What are you mumbling about? Tell<n>me!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Nothing. I'm just realizing how out of<n>sorts I've been...

text_block_list.name: Sweep Tosho
text_block_list.text: Huh? What'd you say? I couldn't<n>hear you!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: If that's my problem, then...

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Maybe what I need right now... is to<n>have some fun.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
...Right. Let's go, Sweep. Thank you<n>for casting that spell on
me.

text_block_list.name: Sweep Tosho
text_block_list.text:
Seriously, what is going on?! Wait...<n>Do you mean my magic
worked?!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Hehe... Well done, Sweep Pea! ♪

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Huh? So you're not going home?

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Nope. Sorry for being so indecisive.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
No worries! I have nooo idea what<n>happened to change your
mind,<n>but—oh, where's Tickezo?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Heeey! Everyone!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Eeek!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Oh, Scarlet! You came back! Nice<n>timing!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Since this is Maruzen's hundredth<n>visit here, they said we
can have<n>exclusive use of the entire light-up<n>pool tonight
as a special treat!

text_block_list.name: Spe and Scarlet
text_block_list.text: We can?!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Oh yeah! I'd completely forgotten<n>about that!
